summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.0 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 223 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1806 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and little or no wind. Moderate rainfall, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dark. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
